Plot: A musical, stop-motion adaptation of the well-known movie, Buddy, a human raised in the north pole, goes to New York to find his family.
Title: Elf: Buddy's Musical Christmas
Writer: Thomas Meehan (teleplay), Bob Martin (teleplay), Aaron Horvath (teleplay), Michael Jelenic (teleplay), David Berenbaum (characters by)
Actors: Mark Hamill, Jim Parsons, Kate Micucci, Rachel Bloom
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.
